user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Lisa at MarketHub (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. You can check out MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["lisa@markethub.com"],"subject":"Inquiry About Potential Discounts","body":"Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well. I’ve been exploring MarketHub’s solutions through MyDealFinder and I’m impressed by what your platform offers.

Could you please let me know if there are any current or upcoming discounts, promotions, or special pricing arrangements available? I’m looking to finalize our budget soon and any information you can provide would be very helpful.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
[Your Phone]
"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Lisa at MarketHub asking about potential discounts. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or a follow-up scheduled!

final_output: Email sent to Lisa at MarketHub asking about potential discounts. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or a follow-up scheduled!
